description: Try our easy to follow Zerella Fresh Tzatziki Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mash,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Zerella Fresh Tzatziki Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop the peeled Spud Lite Potatoes, place into a pot and cover with cool water.
Place on stove and bring to boil. Boil for approximately 15 to 20 minutes until soft. Drain the potatoes and leave aside in strainer.
Dry wipe pot and place back on heat. Add the olive oil then fry the garlic with cracked salt and pepper.
Once the garlic is fried, remove from heat, add potatoes into the pot and mash. Now fold in the lemon, yogurt and mint using a wooden spoon.
